name: Portative Plateform
description:
In Portative Plateform you don't control anything except your character, the plateform is controlled by a giant robot who want you to die as quickly as possible. Unfortunately, you can't beat him, but you can drive him crazy by staying alive as long as you can.

He will throw different attacks at you, lasers, jigsaw, you will have to dodge all these traps if you want to stay alive and have a little honor before you die.

RULES :  You touch a laser ->         You die !You touch a jigsaw ->      You die ! CONTROLS :  Jump        Arrow Key UpMove Left or Right         Arrow Key Left/Right GAME :

The game was created by Matteo Benaissa.
